android.content.res

Class XResources.DimensionReplacement

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.res.XResources.DimensionReplacement
  • Enclosing class:
    XResources

    public static class XResources.DimensionReplacement
extends java.lang.Object
    callback function for XResources.getDimension(int), XResources.getDimensionPixelOffset(int) and XResources.getDimensionPixelSize(int)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      XResources.DimensionReplacement(float value, int unit)
      Create an object that can be use for XResources.setReplacement(int, java.lang.Object) to replace a dimension resource.

    • Constructor Detail

      • XResources.DimensionReplacement

        public XResources.DimensionReplacement(float value,
                               int unit)
        Create an object that can be use for XResources.setReplacement(int, java.lang.Object) to replace a dimension resource.
        Parameters:
        value - The value of the replacement, in the unit specified with the next parameter.
        unit - One of the COMPLEX_UNIT_* constants in @{link TypedValue}.
